title: Boating enthusiasts unite
caption: Boating enthusiasts unite
desc: Today marks the last day of the Vancouver International Boat Show held at BC Place and Granville Island, pictured here. Boating enthusiasts gather here every year to take in the various boating models and accessories. Alongside the vibrant displays are a series of informative demonstrations held by experts from the industry. Dubbed as the largest boat show in western Canada, the Vancouver International Boat Show easily attracts at least 30,000 visitors to the event.
